name: OCKAnyReadOnlyPatientStore
desc: A read-only custom store that fetches patient data objects.

items.name: var patientDelegate: OCKPatientStoreDelegate?
items.desc: The object that handles callbacks from a patient store when the contents of the patient store change.

items.name: func fetchAnyPatient(withID: String, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyPatient>)
items.desc: Fetches a patient asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func fetchAnyPatients(query: OCKAnyPatientQuery, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyPatient]>)
items.desc: Fetches an array of patients asynchronously from the store.
